attributes.action: support parental control by barring use of premium rate calls on childrens TV channels and shows
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: satellite TV companies and phone companies promote -simple 'red button' remote control access to premium rate numbers on childrens interactive games, by children. They do not overtly warn parents of this access at the point of installation and I believe - all such access should be barred at the outset and only accessed on release of that bar by the parent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
